alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 11:06AM MST until January 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
